column4: Hello, I am having some strange problems. I installed ubuntu, them copied to this computer the contents of my previous home folder, includen the hidden files inside my actual home folder. I don' t know exactly if my problems began at this point, cause I' ve already deleted all my hidden files and nothing. I have some strange behaviours. One is in my themes, I can' t change the window border colour, that is the same blue from my previous XFCE theme in th
your having the problem because you copied your .* files that effects your theme and lots of other things
I thought creating another user would reset it, but no...
Alos deleted all hidden files from roots home
deleting the hidden file will restart them and everything will be default in the next login
Yes, but didn' t work for me. I still get only blue window border, instead of normal human colours
and this strange behaviour applies to others themes...
I created a new user also, and this new user gets only bl;ue colours... Besides this problem of not beeing able to set my keybindings, wich I don' t know if are realted
- is there a deeper why to restore the default settings than creating new user. Tried reinstallation of numerous packages, as human theme, metacity, etc. But still nothing
heheheh i don't know acctually im a GUIless dude , thats why im using irssi :D
:D hope you'll find someone to help you .. or just get the important file and use windows :P LOL or reinstall deb
i used to work on gentoo for a long time ... i love it!!! it wastes the whole day in installing things on it :P LOL!!
its a library to support caca in some multimedia players like mplayer libcaca views videos in ASII
